alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 24 at 3:28AM EST until December 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches for a storm total of 4 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Southeastern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard-like conditions are possible due to blowing snow resulting in very low visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence
